From the brand

Bamworld brings modern designs to transform your home that will surely space saving need for your home. In addition, we offers a variety of furniture for different families. We believe that quality material and unique design can get more customers love. so we design and produce different furniture for you to live a more comfortable and stylish life.

Large Plant Stand

Corner Plant Stand

Tall Plant Stand

【7 Pots Plant Stand】Unique design capable of holding 7 pot plants. The plant stand can be used as a decorative piece to organize your selection of plants. The stand is suitable for use indoors and outdoors.
【Durable And Sturdy】Wider width (12 inch) and clever use of the triangle stability principle makes the wood plant holder more stable.Also, plastic joints consolidate this plant stand.All of these give you more durable structure.
【Natural Wood With Carbonization】This plant rack is made of natural wood which underwent 1000 °F high temperature carbonization. Because of the carbonization process, no varnish or paint is required thus it is more safe for use and environmentally friendly
【Easy To Assemble】Explicit instruction and plastic joints make it easy to assemble. You may finish it within 15 minutes. We also offer you all tools may need.
【180 Days Worry-free Warranty】We offer 180 days warranty and 24h friendly customer service. If there are ever any issues about the product, please feel free to contact us and we will give you a free replacement or full refund.

Product Description

Power Tool Organizer

3 Quick and Easy Ways This Power Tool Orangizer Wall Mount Will Save Money, Time and Make You Money Even If Your Already the Best Tradesperson in the world!!

STOP WASTING MONEY: Made from ultra durable SPCC cold rolled steel, this power tool organizer is designed by professionals and is built to last which means you wont be wasting your hard earned money on fragile timber tool organizers!SAVE TIME: This power tool storage rack features 5 slots to hold cordless power tools, and 2 open shelves to keep your tools organized in one central location. No more wasting time looking through drawers , toolboxes and random places for your tools again which means you will have time to sit down and watch the game or spend more time with the kids!MAKE MORE MONEY: Holds up to 14 jobber drill bits starting form 1/16” to ½” and dedicated storage for screwdrivers and hand tools which means you’ll locate your tools quickly and complete projects fast so you can get to your next customer/client!

WARNING : Do Not Even Consider Buying Another Power Tool Organizer Until You Read This:

HAPPY WIFE , HAPPY LIFE: Having your tools organized and ready to go at a moments notice for any project will allow you to complete those honey-do list jobs that you’ve been getting bugged about for months which means you will be in the good books and not the dog house!INCREDIBLE SUPPORT: Each exclusive tool storage shelf can support up to 66 pounds which means you’ll feel safe that your load and tools will always be supported!PROTECTION AGAINST DAMAGE: Featuring a high-quality powder-coated finish which helps you protect against damage and is easy to wipe clean !

The Perfect Solution If You Want To Look Like A Professional Tradesperson Even If You Are Just A Avid Do-It-Yourself’er :

ALL THE GEAR BUT NO IDEA ? : These heavy-duty tool organizers and storage drill rack features colors to match your favorite power tool brands which means even if your not a professional tradesperson you can look like one!STRESS FREE INSTALLATION: This garage storage rack is so quick and easy to assemble even the most amateur DIY’ers can do it with ease! Fewer screws are needed compared to other ordinary timber power tool holders and also comes with wall mounting hardware which means no more pulling your hair out over stripped nuts!WHAT’S INCLUDED:(1) x Steel Tool OrganizerAssembly HardwareWall Mounting HardwareAssembly Instructions

Steel
TOOLGANIZE YOUR GARAGE: Enjoy unsurpassed shop organization with the Toolganize Power Tool Storage Organizer. Keep all of your tools organized in one central location which means you’ll never be wasting time looking for your tools again!
DESIGNED BY TRADESMEN , BUILT FOR STRENGTH : Made from powder-coated SPCC cold rolled steel for heavy duty strength and durability, this wall tool organizer is designed by professionals to last which means you wont be wasting your money on fragile timber tool organizers!
ROOM FOR ALL YOUR TOOLS: This garage tool organizer has 2 solid shelves, 5 drill holder slots for cordless power tools, holds 14 jobber drill bits starting form 1/16” to ½”, and dedicated storage for screwdrivers and hand tools Which means you’ll locate your tools quickly and get your jobs done faster!
FLAT PACKED & EASY TO ASSEMBLE: This garage storage rack is quick and easy to assemble! The garage tool organizer wall mount needs fewer screws than ordinary timber power tool holders and also comes with wall mounting hardware which means no more pulling your hair out over stripped nuts!
ALL THE GEAR AND NO IDEA?: These heavy-duty tool organizers and storage drill racks features colors to match your favorite power tool brands which means even if your not a professional tradesperson you can look like one!

item.title: Garden of Life RAW Probiotics Vaginal Care Shelf Stable – 50 Billion CFU Guaranteed Through Expiration, Acidophilus – Once Daily – Certified Gluten Free – No Refrigeration – 30 Vegetarian Capsules
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Garden of Life RAW Probiotics Vaginal Care promotes yeast balance, vaginal and urinary tract health. Maintaining a healthy bacterial balance promotes vaginal and urinary tract health. Garden of Life RAW Probiotics Vaginal Care is a high-potency, RAW, whole food probiotic formula containing a proprietary Vaginal Care Blend featuring eight probiotic ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $34.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:43:42 UTC – Details)


Garden of Life RAW Probiotics Vaginal Care promotes yeast balance, vaginal and urinary tract health. Maintaining a healthy bacterial balance promotes vaginal and urinary tract health. Garden of Life RAW Probiotics Vaginal Care is a high-potency, RAW, whole food probiotic formula containing a proprietary Vaginal Care Blend featuring eight probiotic strains providing meaningful vaginal and urinary tract health support. RAW means our probiotics are uncooked, untreated, unadulterated; with no binders or fillers and no carriers. What we promise on the label is what you get-50 billion live probiotic cultures in a convenient once-daily capsule.
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 4.63 x 2.32 x 2.32 inches; 2.82 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 103330
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ May 15, 2018
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Garden of Life
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07CZ5ZDFT

DIGESTION SUPPORT: This 50 billion CFU, once-daily probiotic supplement contains Lactobacillus acidophilus and Bifidobacterium (Bifidobacteria) lactis, and others for digestive health
PROBIOTIC FOR WOMEN: Maintaining a healthy bacterial balance in your digestive system is key to optimizing your overall well-being; Our Vaginal Care Blend includes 8 Clinically Studied Probiotic Strains for yeast balance, urinary tract and vaginal health
PROBIOTIC POTENCY GUARANTEED THROUGH EXPIRATION: We begin with high levels of probiotics to ensure viability, even if the product is warm for a few days during shipment—especially during summer or in warmer climates; Shelf stable, no need to refrigerate!
VAGINAL YEAST-DIGESTING ENZYME SUPPLEMENT: Delivers enzymes Cellulase, Hemicellulase and Lysozyme to help break down yeast cell walls; Vaginal Care is also NSF Gluten-Free, with no binders, fillers or carriers

Raw Probiotics from Garden of Life

Raw Probiotics is an innovative line of Raw, whole food probiotic formulas that emulates eating fermented food. Inspired by the research of Dr. Eli Metchnikoff, the “Father of Probiotics,” these daily and targeted formulas are made with Bulgarian yogurt, Eastern European wild kefir, powerful probiotic strains, fruits and vegetables—plus protein-digesting enzymes.

Available in both daily and targeted condition-specific formulas, Raw Probiotics are never heated more than 115°F—maintaining more live nutrients, enzymes and probiotic strains and offering the greatest targeted benefit.† The “Raw” in Raw Probiotics means more than low heat during manufacturing; Raw Probiotics are uncooked, untreated and unadulterated, with no binders, fillers, or other artificial or chemical ingredients often seen in other probiotic supplements (such as magnesium stearate and sodium ascorbate). All of our Raw Probiotics formulas contain premium quality, diverse strains of high cell count probiotics, promoting flora diversity as found in nature†. They are also cultivated and packaged in temperature controlled facilities, so potency is good through expiration when stored under recommended storage conditions.

Shelf Stable Potency Promise

Thanks to our unique, Patent Pending Shelf Stable technology—a food grade desiccant lined, BPA Free plastic bottle—this product does not require refrigeration during shipment or after opening, ensuring that your probiotics Arrive Alive and stay alive. We simply recommend that you store your product in a cool, dry place such as a cupboard or pantry. This is a convenient option for those who wish to take their probiotics on-the-go.

U.S. Pat. No. 6,769,558 – Issue Date: 8/3/18 and 7,198,161 – Issue Date: 4/3/19.

Raw Whole Food Goodness

All of our Raw Probiotics formulas combine traditional cultured foods like Bulgarian yogurt, Eastern European wild kefir, and fruits & vegetables—Red Bell Peppers, Green Peas, Plums and Cherries, to name a few—with studied probiotic strains and protein-digesting enzymes. Our ‘Whole Food Probiotic’ philosophy means your Raw Probiotics are delivered as close to nature as we can possibly make it.

Powerful Probiotic Formulas

Our daily and targeted Raw Probiotics formulas deliver concentrated, diverse strains of probiotics with a higher CFU count—with 30+ unique strains in each formula—providing powerful probiotic support.†

Read more

Read more

Price: $34.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:43:42 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Jerry & Maggie is a global distributor, developer, and manufacturer of Home Décor and Office Supplies.
We established on the strength of brand names and private label programs in 2011, we develop and craft unrivaled products that drive sales for years. Explore our site to understand and enjoy all we have to offer. There must be a product you like because our designers create our fascination in the heart of the art and love.

Composition of two main parts – the position and the distance between two parts can be adjusted and rotated to best fit your needs – a great decoration at home or office

Flat surface and sturdy construct – excellent craftsmanship process – perfect for placing office supplies, documents, books, and plants

Jerry & Maggie’s adjustable storage rack is great for storage, organize,and clean up your desktop and workstation. Made of natural wood which provide stability and security.

Adjustable and Style

Features 2 separate parts that can be arranged close together to create a small shelf rack, arranged further apart to create a longer shelf, or set together at any angle you choose to best fit your space and your style.

More space for table

You can have more space for your workstation. You can organize books, office supplies, and other stuff to clean up your desktop space in your ideal way.

Easy installation

The product is assembly required. The storage rack is easy to install and change the direction. You just need to move the parts and arrange the way you need.

Material of natural wood , definitely no pungent scent – non-toxic | green healthy life style | sturdy board
Composition of two main parts – the position and the distance between two parts can be adjusted and rotated to best fit your needs – a great decoration at home or office
Flat surface and sturdy construct – excellent craftsmanship process – perfect for placing office supplies, documents, books, and plants
Lightweight ( 6 lb ) and 5 units organizer easy to transport and carry – save space on your office desktop – provide more options to meet your style
Approximate Displayed Product Measurement (L*H*W): 16*15.8*6.8 inches

From the brand

Top Products! Recommend

Hot Products! Recommend

Quadruple Storage Space: The shelf lamp has 5 tiers, and each board allows to put 50 pound max. You can put photo frame, plants, books, or any items on it (ATTENTION: To avoid the lamp fall down, please use the “Torque” to keep steady).
Quality Lampshade with Soft Light: We provide a beautiful lampshade, it makes of high-quality linen. The lighting through the lampshade becomes soft and gentle, which creates a cozy and comfortable atmosphere in the night.
15mins Easy Installation: We provide detailed manual and intallation video. This lamp is easy to install, normally can be finished by one person. The whole lamp decors your living room, bedroom, office or any home corner, its simple and sector design suit for all furnishing style.
addlon’s 3 Year Product Support: We proudly stand behind all of our products 100% and we offer 3 year quality support. Please contact us FIRST in anytime if you have any problem. We are glad to provide help.

Arced Design

This arced design and its soft line makes the lamp more beautiful when it put in the room corner.

Fit Corner Perfectly

90° Make the lamp can be put in the room corner perfectly. The lamp will not occupy too much space.

Pull-chain Switch

The pull-chain is easy to control. The chain is tested to make sure it can work normally after more than ten thousand pull.

3CCT LED Bulb

The package comes with 1 3cct LED bulb, it has 3000K/4500K/6500K for choice. Suit for different scenes.
